storyInfo: No matter how touching words may be, they ultimately are weak and frail in the face of iron wills. The conversation ends in battle.

attributes.content: She doesn't.... look right...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The Originium crystals floating in the air beside her.... How is that possible?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's repulsive dissociation...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Did the Originium crystals permeate her skin to form black ice crystals along with the water molecules in the air?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Permeate....? Permeation?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doesn't it hurt! Doesn't that hurt her?!!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't you feel pain, white rabbit?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Enough... That's enough... Why are you doing this? Stop it!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Mmmng..... Nnnng!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya? I don't like the look on your face.... Wait!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Amiya, don't do it! Don't reach into her mind!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I didn't... I'm not using Arts! But her emotions.... Her emotions are pouring into my consciousness...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've been waiting for you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You want to kill Reunion's commander, don't you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Now she's standing right in front of you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Here's your target. Get hot, burning hot.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Hot...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Is that.... Her emotions...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Team, stand by!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: FrostNova, we don't need to waste our breath here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Lungmen exiled the Infected without a care as to where they could go. They are not coming.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Even though there were still thousands of Infected people in the city.... Lungmen resigned them to their fate.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: No one will interfere in our fight.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: So many of us.... against you alone?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What else?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Honestly, we're a little outnumbered. No one should be stupid enough to take an avalanche head on.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But actually, head on against an avalanche, I think I'd come out on top?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But you're one of those.... like where all the cold in the world gathers up into a single focal point.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I thought your Yeti Squad was pushing your abilities to the limit, making your Arts more powerful and effective.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I was wrong. They didn't make you stronger.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's your Arts that made them stronger.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: As long as my brothers and sisters are with me, I can't risk hurting them by releasing my full power.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But now. They're all dead.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: There are no living things left around me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Hmm!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: The temperature has dropped dramatically....
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Not good! Such a low temperature.... it's thrown off my instruments!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I no longer have any reason to contain the winter within me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: What the hell? Does Reunion have its own walking Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What is the lowest temperature Originium Arts has ever achieved? I've got a feeling she's breaking records one after another right now...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: FrostNova, I'll ask you again, are you serious about this?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Anything else you want to say?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ——Knock it off, white rabbit, you're going to get yourself killed.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You're really going to die! You're strong enough already! You don't have to push it this hard!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You don't have to do this to get a fight! If you want to fight, fight all you want after this!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I don't want to see Infected killing each other!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There's no reason for us to fight to the death here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ready up!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Pfft!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She froze my fingernails. They're cracking.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You really want to kill us?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I have a reason.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: As commander, I've lost.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ——but as a warrior, I'm still in the fight.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Amiya-1, Blaze-4, all units, do you copy?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Exit the area. Now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You too, Gavial!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because you can't come back to save us if you don't get out now!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who's the best sniper in our squad?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You might die. Are you sure you want to volunteer?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm sure. I am the best, at the moment.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Okay, GreyThroat, you stay. Everyone else, get the hell out.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hurry!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: Why did you withdraw your team during a decisive battle?

attributes.content: Up against FrostNova, the number of squads doesn't make a difference. They have no way to protect themselves. And she can kill in an instant.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There's not much you can do, even with someone as skilled as Rangers. It's not the archery, it's the materials.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: My crossbow seems to be useless already.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: It'll be good for a bit. But you decide whether it works or not....
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If it was up to me, I'd take a few shots at her with Rhodes Island's main guns. That'd be pretty helpful.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Or conjure up a dozen fireteam to spray ammo and Arts into her to see what she can take.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She'll run out of steam eventually. But... maybe not before we do.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Did you bring a tourniquet?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You should ask me if I have any anticoagulants with me, the kind that won't mess up.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...You asked earlier why FrostNova could endure the pain of Originium crystals piercing her skin?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know why. I can feel it.....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She could endure it because the pain inside her was worse... Several times worse.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Now, Doctor, you need to go too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Do you want to see it through...?
...To be a trustworthy Doctor...?

attributes.options: I want to see it through.

attributes.content: ...Amiya.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I... Dr. {@nickname} is.... committed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Your decision won't do them any favors.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: So why do you do it?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: I told you, you can come to Rhodes Island.
And I will fight shoulder to shoulder with my operators.

attributes.content: I get it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Blaze, GreyThroat, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's going to be an uphill battle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmph. Heh heh.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Check it out, white rabbit, that's our Dr. {@nickname} and Amiya!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Don't do this...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Whatever.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Are you ready?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Let's get started!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Forward! Explosion!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: A fine attack.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ——Ice blades?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Pfft!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Kitten, do you think I'm a caster.... So frail?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Are you serious?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The heat currents writhing on your saw blades are no match for my cold. You cannot stop my frost.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I didn't underestimate you, but I didn't think....
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: My saw can cut through a city wall, and you can block it?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: To me, your movements, your strength, it doesn't even register.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Next we go for the throat.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Air! Compression! Demolition!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: *Cough*, hahahahaha, *cough*.... Pfft! That was a close call, I almost got an ice blade through my jugular!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hah, that's right. You're a warrior just like me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What do I do, Amiya? I'm running out of ideas.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Time to tag you in.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Amiya... My finger is getting too cold to pull the trigger.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We have to end this quickly.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: (Her Originium Arts are a hundred times stronger than they were back in the ruins...!)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (And she's not out of tricks yet!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (It won't be enough.... If I don't loosen my rings, everyone will freeze to death!)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: FrostNova--
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't even think about it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My finger?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh.... Gah!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I watched your entire battle with Talulah. Tweaking these rings enhances your Arts.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Ten rings, all of them.... Frozen?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You are too childish to be a warrior.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: So you chilled a few rings? You've got a mouth on you, don't you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Huh? What the...? I turned up the heat this high and they're not melting at all?)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze.... Stop it, don't waste blood. This is..... This is a very powerful, and very fine Originium Art...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The cold stream swept along the Originium crystals and wrapped around us as we entered the area.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She hit us with it before it could get cut off by your thermal currents, without us even noticing!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mmmf.... My Arts can't cut through!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The battle began as soon as you set foot in this room.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: These ten frost rings will drain your body heat and squeeze your Originium Arts. The more power you apply to them, the stronger and colder the ice crystals become.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Pathetic.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Eruption? Energy store? Reserves?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Trying to defeat me with a few tricks.... Do you know what you're up against?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: GreyThroat, piercing bolt!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Roger! Six shot, ready!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: The Talulah I knew would engineer your demise long before it all began.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Air compression! Fire!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Loose!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: And now Rhodes Island is just like these bolts....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Wha...? What? Why did the bolt...? Freeze in midair?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Truly pathetic.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (She knocked it off course with her air streams, then broke it with cold?!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (GreyThroat, what are your arrows made of?)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (It's Rhodes Island standard-issue, carbon fiber hybrid aluminum.)
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: (Oh no. Ugh, we're in trouble.)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Even, somewhat shameful.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Whether she knows it or not, her Arts have reached a level that's well beyond anything the damned scholars are talking about these days.)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Just a little pinch.... And you fall to pieces.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Think about it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I'm just the leader of Yeti Squad. Reunion is controlled by the woman named Talulah who intercepted you at Chernobog and killed your friends.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: What do you think Talulah is...? The leader of Reunion, the Infected messiah?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: She didn't earn the title of messiah!;........;There's no such thing.

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Whatever image you have of her in your head, if she were some kind of 'messiah', the old man and I wouldn't be leading 'Reunion' at all.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: She was at first a military officer, then a warrior, and finally a leader.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But she has betrayed us.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The most determined and committed warrior I've ever known was actually a case of assumed identity...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And her last remaining enemies are people like you who have no resolve and never had to look death in the face.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Watch your tone, white rabbit. You're not the only one who puts her life on the line.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You have remorse in your eyes too.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You don't have to tell me!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're not ready to accept their deaths.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: That's enough!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: *Cough*, haha, *cough*....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Am I ready?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Cough*.... *Cough*!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I've thought about it so many times, seen them dying so many times in my nightmares, I just never thought...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You're the same way, kitten. I can see that.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'I imagined my tragic death, but I never thought it would be so lonely.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You had brothers. So did I.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The Rhodes Island operators who fought Talulah at Chernobog were each quite heroic.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The one they called Ace was a warrior tenacious to a level I've rarely seen in my life. He fought with an emotion few warriors do.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...'Sorrow.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: We're not close enough yet that I'm really comfortable talking about my old battle buddies with you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Only a fighter who incessantly reflects on his battles would be concerned. He was a good warrior.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: As are you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: He died alone.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Are you sorry you lost him?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Do you regret not having the chance to save him?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Absolutely!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Aren't you going to ask anyone?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Ask.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Ask that question you don't know how to form, that you don't know who to ask.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'Why?'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (.......Such strong emotions.... FrostNova!)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Why wasn't I there? Why wasn't I stronger? Why didn't I stop it?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Ugh.... The temperature is still dropping!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Stand by me! Her cold is so overpowering, it's all I can do to keep the air around me warm!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Why?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Why did I fall to the ground when my brothers and sisters needed me most?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: They're all fools. All fools who only know how to help each other, who only want to survive, who only want a place to live.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Why can't I even grant the wishes of a bunch of idiots?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Why is Ursus so cruel to our people, and so callous to ordinary Ursus?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Why is it that the little flame that could ignite the world has to be extinguished in this foreign land?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Why is it that in the war we waged to put a stop to evil, I wasted more lives?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Cough*, *cough*.... Unf, *cough*, *cough*...!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Unf.... Ugh....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Why did we give up our lives, *hack*, only to have achieved a lie?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Why...? Why won't this world give me a little more time?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'The Infected should be proud of who they are, and use the simplest means to seize justice from the world'....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: At first, I saw it as only a part of the Reunion ideal.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Indeed, it brought strength to the Infected. They stopped thinking of themselves as the Empire's fodder....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But now I realize that the beliefs that Talulah once taught us about, the ideas that demand grassroots support, and the goals that must be constantly reinforced and corrected, are all gone.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Only instigation. Only indulgence. We were thrown into the toughest of battles, with no input in the ranks, and it all came too soon....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If this is all Talulah's doing, then she deceived everyone from the very beginning.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: She may have deceived you!;........;Things are often not as they seem.

attributes.content: If she would take the Infected to that darkest of futures.... To complete her most wicked plan...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Then her evil must be destroyed.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But my brothers and sisters, the countless dead Infected and uninfected....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Nothing can bring them back.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...What made her this way?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Ugh.... Ugh...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It shouldn't be like this, it never should have been!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My people.... My brothers and sisters!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Amiya
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Do you hear that, Amiya?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova..!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The cold stream is too much.... She can even condense it into a form!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's blasting away my heat flow!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Is the cold enough to chill your body heat? Is death enough to make you squeamish?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You won't, Amiya, and you can't!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You can read minds, can't you, bunny?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Read now, then, my rage, the heart that has been stifled by bitterness and boiled in my breast for more than a decade, and yet never given up beating!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Read it, Amiya! Read it well!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: How much anger is there in this heart, over dead loved ones, over the corrupt Ursus, over the Infected, over the people of Ursus, in this heart that will not stop, that will not die!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Did you ever hate her, Miss FrostNova?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...*Cough*.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I never hated her.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Even if she was the cause of all this pain today, I have never hated her.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: What does hatred bring you and me?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I have nothing but endless, seething rage for this despicable planet.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: How about you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Don't you have such anger in your heart?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Don't you have relatives who died of Oripathy? A friend who died thanks to the indifference of this world?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You haven't lost the people you depend on to survive, to give you something to live for?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Just proclaiming a certain philosophy, just taking on a certain Art, just organizing a few teams....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Will that be enough to defeat Talulah?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It's time to wake up from your fantastical dreams.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I get it, Miss FrostNova.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everything that just flooded into my mind, I know what it is.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's pushing Rhodes Island forward? What motivates you to keep fighting?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Dead ahead! A huge cold stream! It's about... Just about... the shape of a dagger!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If this keeps up, I'll have to surrender my back and gather the heat flow in front of me as a shield....
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But her cold stream was robbing the air of its molecular vibrations. Even if I managed to form the shield, I couldn't hold it for long!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Doctor, come on, you must have some idea!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: Since we can't break it, we'll just have to hold on!

attributes.content: That's like saying nothing!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No... The Doctor is right.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: FrostNova doesn't have much life left in her. If we can hold out, we win.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What are you talking about? If we do that, she'll die!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: It was her choice, and the only chance she left us!

attributes.content: What about your choices?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: In the face of the evil that must be destroyed, in the face of the betrayer who has usurped the ideals of the Infected, what is in your heart? Why does it beat?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Cough*, *cough*.... If you can't even defeat me, how are you going to face her? How are you going to lead the countless Infected? How are you going to fight against this malignant world!!!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I can't be mad at you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are wasting my time.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: No, FrostNova... I know what I'm going to do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't really read minds. And reading hearts doesn't mean I can understand someone better than people who don't have this ability.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I just can't refuse.... I can't shut out the emotions that pour out of you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Flooding my mind with pain and worry, and....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Anger.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're sober and calm, but the anger burns so hot that I want to pull back...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I can't. FrostNova, I know exactly what I have to do. I will not refuse you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss FrostNova, I felt it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Why are you crying?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova... You.....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No. Wipe your tears! You will not cry before your enemy.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Amiya, tell me your answer.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Mhm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'If we must fight, then we fight to the end.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, we are going to fight FrostNova.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Only one side walks out of here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes. You will now... fight me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Only one of us leaves.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If you can defeat me, it means some will be able to survive——
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I am willing to join Rhodes Island. I am willing to fight together with you against the enemies of the Infected, your way.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: This is my burden to bear.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: I hope you keep your word.

attributes.content: When I make a promise, I keep it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And.... Miss FrostNova.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Infected don't need anyone to lead them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're just fighting for the same beliefs, not for any one person.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Never for any one person.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ——That's right. Corruption must be eradicated. Defeat me, and defeat Talulah.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: What are you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I can be anyone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who are you fighting for?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: For everyone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Good. Amiya...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Hack*.... Thank you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'Even time itself will freeze here.... ♪'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The cold is moving in on us! GreyThroat!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ready!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Doctor, stay by my side. I'll try to protect you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You will die here in battle, and I will extinguish your absurd fantasies.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Or, defeat me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Defeat me. And show me hope.
attributes.name: FrostNova
